meta_strategy_documentation.title: Meta Andromeda Ads Strategy
meta_strategy_documentation.source_reference: Antonio Ventre - Copy My 4x ROAS Strategy

core_philosophy.description: The algorithm now uses creative elements (visuals, hooks, copy) to identify audiences rather than manual targeting settings.
core_philosophy.objective: Achieve 'Creative Diversity' to signal the AI to reach distinct pockets of users.
core_philosophy.golden_rule: Do not test minor variations (button colors). Test completely distinct concepts.

creative_mix_requirements.purpose: Targets unaware users by highlighting specific pain points.
creative_mix_requirements.example: Tired of back pain? This chair aligns your spine.

creative_mix_requirements.purpose: Targets comparison shoppers by highlighting superiority.
creative_mix_requirements.example: Split screen: Our Product (Green Checks) vs. Competitors (Red Xs).
Selfie-style video explaining the 'Why' behind the brand.

creative_mix_requirements.purpose: Social proof to validate the purchase.

creative_mix_requirements.example: High-quality photo with text overlay: '50% OFF - Ends Tonight'.

testing_campaign.targeting: Broad (No interests, no lookalikes, open age/gender)

ad_set_structure.content: 3-5 distinct variations of that concept per ad set.

scaling_campaign.execution_strategy: Move only winning Post IDs from the Testing Campaign. Do not duplicate creatives; use existing IDs to keep social proof.

questions_to_answer: What specific problem do they have?

step_2_hook_creation.visual_hook: Pattern interrupt, weird motion, or bright colors.
step_2_hook_creation.text_overlay: Big, bold benefit statement immediately visible.

kill_rules.action: Turn Off Ad (Creative is not stopping the scroll)

scale_rules.condition: 3+ Sales at or below Target CPA
scale_rules.action: Extract Post ID and duplicate into CBO Scaling Campaign

launch_checklist: Select 3 distinct angles (e.g., Problem/Solution, UGC, Us vs. Them)
Create 3 variations for each angle (9 total assets)
Set up 3 Ad Sets in ABO Campaign (Broad Targeting)
Analyze data, kill losers, migrate winners to CBO
